item.title: Commands to get XP like ::startthieving!
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

[quote=“koolkats109, post:6, topic:25931”]Can you make a code for me with all of theese into one code?
(sort of like a master code so I can have all stats 135)
Please?[/quote]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); sendMessage("Max levels ftw o.O"); }

Your server probally has it, try ::master it probz works.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands to get XP like ::startthieving!
item.dc:creator: @aronscape aronscape
item.description:
@aronscape wrote:

Purpose: Just making a TUT That gives xp for a skill u want!

Difficulty: For me it was hard because i was figuring out how i coud add the xp but today i solved it so i rate it a 3-10

Assumed Knowledge: C+P+R +JAVA KNOWLEDGE

Server Base: Aronscape

Credits: AronScape+Sk8ter (sk8ter for the idea whit his ::startthieving)

[glow=red,2,300][size=16pt]Short information:[/size] [/glow]

I was thinking on sk8ters ::startthieving Command and i though this u can do whit all skills so i was trying to get a way to get xp added for the skill and after 1 day i found it -.-

[glow=red,2,300]Getting started [/glow] ,First of all open client.java and all all of these commands in the place your commands are,or just put it under “notedbarrows” or “veracs” or somthing.

Attack xp by Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startattack") && playerLevel[0] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[0], 0); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startattack") && playerLevel[0] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Strenght xp by Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startstrenght") && playerLevel[2] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[2], 2); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startstrenght") && playerLevel[2] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Defence lvl xp by command:

else if (command.startsWith("startdefence") && playerLevel[1] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[1], 1); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startdefence") && playerLevel[1] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Hit points Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("starthp") && playerLevel[3] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[3], 3); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("starthp") && playerLevel[3] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Prayer Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startpray") && playerLevel[5] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[5], 5); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startpray") && playerLevel[5] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Magic Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startmage") && playerLevel[6] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[6], 6); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startmage") && playerLevel[6] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Range Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startrange") && playerLevel[4] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[4], 4); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startrange") && playerLevel[4] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

RuneCrafting Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startrc") && playerLevel[20] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[20], 20); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startrc") && playerLevel[20] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Herblore Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startherblore") && playerLevel[15] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[15], 15); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startherblore") && playerLevel[15] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Thieving Xp By command(orriginall one by sk8ter)

else if (command.startsWith("startthieving") && playerLevel[17] < 135) { addSkillXP(4470, 200); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startthieving") && playerLevel[17] >= 135) { sendMessage("Cant use this above lvl 135 thieving buddy!"); }
Agility XP by Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startagility") && playerLevel[16] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[16], 16); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startagility") && playerLevel[16] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Crafting Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startcrafting") && playerLevel[12] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[12], 12); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startcrafting") && playerLevel[12] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Fletching Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startfletching") && playerLevel[9] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[9], 9); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startfletching") && playerLevel[9] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Slayer Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startslayer") && playerLevel[18] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[18], 18); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startslayer") && playerLevel[18] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Mining Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startmining") && playerLevel[14] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[14], 14); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startmining") && playerLevel[14] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Smithing Xp by Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startsmith") && playerLevel[13] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[13], 13); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startsmith") && playerLevel[13] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Fishing Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startfish") && playerLevel[10] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[10], 10); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startfish") && playerLevel[10] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Cooking Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startcook") && playerLevel[7] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[7], 7); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startcook") && playerLevel[7] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
FireMaking Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startfm") && playerLevel[11] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[11], 11); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startfm") && playerLevel[11] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Woodcutting Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startwc") && playerLevel[8] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[8], 8); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startwc") && playerLevel[8] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }
Farming Xp By Command:

else if (command.startsWith("startfarm") && playerLevel[19] < 135) { addSkillXP(200*playerLevel[19], 19); } if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("startfarm") && playerLevel[19] >= 135) { sendMessage("PUT YOUR MSG HERE"); }

Ohhh i Really hope u guys like it it was hard searching for me to get this.
Hope u all can use this TuT!

-Aronscape-

Read full topic
